DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Swallowing 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their ability to swallow in the past seven days, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Swallowing
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._A question about a person's most important health issues._The most recent week, including today._The act of passing something through the mouth and throat into the stomach.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Most Important Issue Past Week Swallowing
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's most important health issues.:The most recent week, including today.:The act of passing something through the mouth and throat into the stomach.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's most important health issues.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
The act of passing something through the mouth and throat into the stomach.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of four responses from swallowing as well as ever to cannot swallow.

PermissibleValues.value: I cannot swallow because it "goes down the wrong way" and chokes me.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cannot Swallow Because it Causes Choking

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cannot Swallow Because it Causes Choking
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual cannot swallow because it chokes them.

Concepts.longName: Cannot Swallow Because it Causes Choking
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual cannot swallow because it chokes them.

PermissibleValues.value: I can only swallow liquid food.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual can only swallow liquid foods.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual can only swallow liquid foods.

PermissibleValues.value: I cannot swallow certain solid foods.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual cannot swallow certain solid foods.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual cannot swallow certain solid foods.

PermissibleValues.value: I can swallow as well as ever.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Can Swallow as Well as Ever

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Can Swallow as Well as Ever
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual can swallow as well as ever.

Concepts.longName: Can Swallow as Well as Ever
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual can swallow as well as ever.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
